post:
Hello LET members!

You ask for it, you get. Due to many requests we now have a budget KVM package, for just €3.5 per month, no strings attached.

This is a limited offer, 30 packages in total available.
Upgrading from our LXC offer is not possible unfortunately.

Our servers are located in our own data centers in Stockholm and are fully owned by us.

We can announce your own ipv4 and ipv6 subnets for free

SAS storage
KVM Virtualization
Virtualizor control panel to start, restart,stop, reinstall your vps. Monitor VPS activity, traffic, disk usage and many more
Servers are located in Sweden
1000Mbit uplink
20Gbps DDOS protection
Centos 6, 7
Debian 8.5, 9.6
Ubuntu 14.4, 16.4, 18.4

Setup time
Immediately after payment.

    Processor cores: 1
    Memory: 1024 MB (1GB)
    Disk space: 50GB SAS storage
    Traffic: 400 GB
    Ipv4 IP address: 1
    Ipv6 address: /64
    Connection: 1Gbps
    Virtualization: KVM
    Country: Sweden
    Price per month: €3,50

[Order here](https://billing.swedendedicated.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=88)

Options
No upgrades possible, including additional ip's or traffic.

Payment Information
Only BTC and Credit card accepted due to paypal high fees.

City: Stockholm
